title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
Steps to reproduce: 1. Modify the font size of the label.
OB: When the font size of a label is modified, its height does not change accordingly.
EB: The label's height should be adjusted to justify the font size when it is modified.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Modify the font size of a label.
2. Observe that the label's height does not change accordingly.
